title: Simon Hix on the Queen's Speech
itunes:author: Professor Simon Hix, Martin Rogers
description: Contributor(s): Professor Simon Hix, Martin Rogers | Following the first Queen’s Speech under a Conservative majority since 1996, Professor Simon Hix discusses the key bills proposed by the government.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Simon Hix, Martin Rogers | Following the first Queen’s Speech under a Conservative majority since 1996, Professor Simon Hix discusses the key bills proposed by the government.
